long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Toilet Roll is a quirky and addictive game available as a Chrome extension. In this unique and light-hearted game, your mission is to guide a roll of toilet paper as it unravels across various bathroom-themed levels. Your goal is to navigate through obstacles, such as plungers and soap dispensers, while collecting bonus items like hand sanitizers and air fresheners. The game challenges your timing and precision as you aim to cover as much ground as possible with the toilet paper roll. With its simple yet engaging gameplay, colorful graphics, and catchy sound effects, Toilet Roll offers a fun and entertaining experience for players of all ages. Whether you're looking for a quick distraction or a lighthearted game to unwind, Toilet Roll on Chrome Extension is sure to bring a smile to your face. Get ready for a hilarious bathroom adventure that will keep you entertained and hooked for hours.
